directions: Chop basil, garlic, and pine nuts in a food processor. Add ricotta cheese to the basil mixture and process. Repeat with Parmesan cheese, olive oil, salt, and black pepper. Add vegetable broth and process until sauce is smooth. Add more broth if pesto is too thick.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons vegetable broth, or as needed
title: Lighter Basil Pesto
